description: The 'Gold Dust' variety of flowering-maple is an amazing example of a unique, striking ornamental. The rounded green leaves are generously dusted with gold highlights, making the foliage a source of interest in its own right. In summer, flowers resembling small orange bells appear in abundance, adding to the landscape. Unlike many flowering plants, this variety of flowering-maple is forgiving of colder climes and can be grown in zone 7, making it ideal for a variety of landscaping settings. This hardy species is easily maintained with a simple pruning and can usually be seen showing off its stunning foliage and flowers for several years.
